entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
